actions.name: Pendulum
actions.description: Effect: Each time the user resolves the same specific attack between consecutive activations, that attack's Power increased by 20%, up to a max increase of 100%. This boost from Pendulum resets if the user is switched out, @Affliction[fainted], combat ends, or the user declares a different attack.
